title: कछुए के विदेशी नस्ल मनुष्य जैसी आवाज़ निकालते हैं? नहीं, एडिटेड वीडियो वायरल
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: A rare animal that cries like a man was found in Arabian peninsula. They used to believe that the cry was of the dead souls from the graves until they found it crying. 👇🏼 pic.twitter.com/WKsOyV6rVn
